pages.text: $(li)The Warped Fungus is a type of fungus that is commonly generated in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/nether/warped_forest)Warped Forests$(/l) and rarely in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/nether/crimson_forest)Crimson Forests$(/l) of the Nether.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/infernal_expansion/warpbeetle)Warpbeetles$(/l) may drop this item upon death too.

$(li)It can be used to scared away $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/hoglin)Hoglins$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to attract $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/strider)Striders$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)You can use Warped Fungus to craft a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/warped_fungus_on_a_stick)Warped Fungus on a Stick$(/l) and a $(l)Fungus & Tongue Stew$().
